item.title: Useful commands in Emacs for efficient editing
item.description:
This article keeps collecting useful commands/keybindings in Emacs for efficient editing.

Warning: It may rely on certain configurations (see my .emacs.d on github). If you found some keybindings are not defined, please refer to the configuration files.
